Substitutes Needed! Teacher and Aide Substitutes. Are you interested in working as a Substitute Teacher or Aide?
Requirements- Bachelor's Degree to be a Substitute Teacher. Sub Aides need 60 hours of College Credit or pass the ETS ParaPro test.
Flexibility- You can sign up to work one to five days a week. Schools call you according to what works for you.
Location- You select what school you want to call you.
For more information or to sign up- Call the Regional Office of Education at 815-625-1495.
